# scm_session_timeout (Data Source)

SessionTimeout data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "scm_session_timeout" "settings_data" {
  id = "c86b4a2c-1621-4c9c-9f9c-c9798bc9da87"

}

output "fetched_settings" {
  description = "Fetched Session Timeout Settings"
  value       = data.scm_session_timeout.settings_data
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) UUID of the resource

### Optional

- `device` (String) The device in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `folder` (String) The folder in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `snippet` (String) The snippet in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.

### Read-Only

- `session_timeouts` (Attributes) Session timeouts (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--session_timeouts))
- `tfid` (String) The Terraform ID.

<a id="nestedatt--session_timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `session_timeouts`

Read-Only:

- `timeout_captive_portal` (Number) Captive Portal (seconds)
- `timeout_default` (Number) Default timeout (seconds)
- `timeout_discard_default` (Number) Discard default (seconds)
- `timeout_discard_tcp` (Number) Discard TCP (seconds)
- `timeout_discard_udp` (Number) Discard UDP (seconds)
- `timeout_icmp` (Number) ICMP (seconds)
- `timeout_scan` (Number) Scan (seconds)
- `timeout_tcp` (Number) TCP (seconds)
- `timeout_tcp_half_closed` (Number) TCP Half Closed (seconds)
- `timeout_tcp_time_wait` (Number) TCP Time Wait (seconds)
- `timeout_tcp_unverified_rst` (Number) Unverified RST (seconds)
- `timeout_tcphandshake` (Number) TCP handshake (seconds)
- `timeout_tcpinit` (Number) TCP init (seconds)
- `timeout_udp` (Number) UDP (seconds)
